HomePage.aboutText1: I am a specialist who builds bridges between complex technology and real business needs. My career path is a unique blend of the IT world and management – before fully dedicating myself to data analytics, I gained extensive experience as a Marketing Manager at the international corporation, Bostik.
HomePage.aboutText2: This background ensures that when I build Power BI dashboards or design Azure architecture, I don't just think about the code. I think about how that data will impact your margins, sales efficiency, and decision-making speed. I help companies stop 'guessing' and start acting based on facts.
